description: Compare keys and their values in the registry. More information: https://learn.microsoft.com/windows-server/administration/windows-commands/reg-compare.

useCases.description: Compare all values under a specific key with another key:
Compare a specific [v]alue under two keys:
Compare all [s]ubkeys and values for two keys:
Only [o]utput the matches ([s]ame) between the specified keys:
[o]utput the differences and matches ([a]ll) between the specified keys:
